type.desc: Tells the component which player is to be used

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

background-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

mobile-mode.desc: Use mobile logic for handling visibility of controls

sources.desc: The one or more sources for Video or Audio

poster.desc: [Video only] The poster image to display before the video is loaded

tracks.desc: [Video only] The one or more tracks for subtitle, captions, etc

label.desc: Label to use for selection purposes

track-language.desc: [Video only] A value that corresponds to the 'label' attribute of the 'tracks' property. This will be the default language

preload.desc: [Video only] Provides a hint to the browser about what the author thinks will lead to the best user experience

dense.desc: When true displays controls window on one line

hide-volume-slider.desc: When true the volume slider control will be hidden

dark.desc: When component is rendered on a dark background

autoplay.desc: Automatically start video/audio when it is ready to play

cross-origin.desc: Whether to use CORS for fetching assets

muted.desc: If the player should be muted

inline.desc: If the player should be inline (see video element playsinline)

loop.desc: If the player should automatically seek back to the start upon reaching the end of the video

controls-display-time.desc: The amount of idle time in milliseconds to wait before hiding the controls

no-controls.desc: If set to true, the controls will never be displayed

playback-rates.desc: [Video only] This is an array of one or more objects for playback rate (speed)

label.desc: The displayed label for user selection

value.desc: The value to use for playback rate

playback-rates.default: [ { label: '.5x', value: 0.5 }, { label: 'Normal', value: 1 }, { label: '1.5x', value: 1.5 }, { label: '2x', value: 2 } ]

playback-rate.desc: Corresponds to the value in playback-rates

content-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the markdown container

content-style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the markdown container

loaded.desc: Emitted when the media has been loaded

ready.desc: Emitted when the media is ready to play. You cannot play/pause or setCurrentTime before this event

duration.desc: Emitted when the duration of the media has been determined

ended.desc: Emitted when the media has finished playing

error.desc: Emitted when there is a media error

paused.desc: Emitted when the media is paused

playing.desc: Emitted when the media starts playing. This will also emit after a pause or a wait

timeupdate.desc: Emitted wenever there is a time update (during play)

curTime.desc: The number play time in seconds

showing.desc: true/false if in fullscreen or not

waiting.desc: Emitted when the media player goes into a wait state (typically waiting while downloading)

showControls.desc: Emitted when the Controls are toggled

showing.desc: true/false if controls are showing or not
true/false if volume is muted or not

showControls.desc: Show the controls. Has no effect is already being displayed

hideControls.desc: Hide the controls. Has no effect is already being hidden

setCurrentTime.desc: Set the current time of the video/audio player (in seconds)

setVolume.desc: Sets the volume as a percent (0-100).

old-browser.desc: Slot for replacing the default old browser text

overlay.desc: Slot for replacing the default overlay

error-window.desc: Slot for replacing the default error window

controls.desc: Slot for replacing the default controls can be replaced

spinner.desc: Slot for replacing the default spinner/loading icon

big-play-button.desc: Slot for replacing the default big play button icon

display-time.desc: Slot for replacing the default display time

position-slider.desc: Slot for replacing the default positioning slider

duration-time.desc: Slot for replacing the default duration time

play.desc: Slot for replacing the default play icon

volume.desc: Slot for replacing the default volume icon

volume-slider.desc: Slot for replacing the default volume slider

settings.desc: Slot for replacing the default settings icon

settings-menu.desc: Slot for replacing the default Settings menu

fullscreen.desc: Slot for replacing the default fullscreen icon
